item.description:
Hello Boston Chihuahua Lovers!

 

I hope you all can attend this indoor meet. They will repeat the second Sunday of the month. This is a new venue for us, is more affordable than previous ventures, and it has parking!!! As always, dogs should be up to date on vaccinations.

 

Some information about the venue

Red Dog Pet Resort & Spa is Boston’s newest 43,000 sq ft. pet boarding facility offering the ultimate pet experience providing care for your pet like it is one of our own.

 

 

Red Dog’s state-of-the art facility offers:

  • 24/7 on site professional staffing
  • A wide array of boarding options, including luxury theme suites
  • An indoor Aquatic Center & Daycare
  • Animal Pickup & Delivery
  • Grooming & Spa Services
  • Chiropractic Care
  • Veterinary Services
  • Retail

For more information, please visit www.bostonreddog.com

 

 

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee
item.name: September 2012: Indoor Meet @ Boston Red Dog
